Name: Sprint Duration
Description: Length of a sprint in days

Name: Max Tasks per Sprint
Description: Limit the number of tasks per sprint

Name: Team Size
Description: Number of members in a team

Name: Task Effort
Description: Effort assigned to a task in hours

Name: Employee Availability
Description: Number of hours per week a worker is available

Name: Certified Skill Ratio
Description: Percentage of certified skills per employee

Name: Story Points per Sprint
Description: Target number of story points completed in a sprint
